Datasets:
Chinese Academy of Sciences - Landslide Dataset

integrating satellite and unmanned aerial vehicle data from nine regions (specifies region)

Link to Download Link to a Paper Using Dataset
  • Format: TIFF; 512 × 512 pixels
  • img, label, and mask
HR-GLDD: Global Dataset

rainfall triggered and five earthquake-triggered multiple landslide events

Link to Download
  • Format: npy
  • Split for test, train, and val
Landslide4Sense: Reference Benchmark Data and Deep Learning Models for Landslide Detection

multi-source satellite remote sensing imagery

Link to Download
  • Format: pytorch
  • Split for test, train, and val
GDCLD: Global Dataset of Coesismic Landslide Mapping

coseismic landslide mapping via multi-source high-resolution remote sensing images

Link to Download Link to a Paper Using Dataset
  • Format: TIFF
  • Split for test, train, and val
Monsoon Triggered Landslides in Nepal

includes timings constrained by Sentinel-1 time series; landslide polygons were mapped by comparing pre- and post-monsoon Landsat-8 images

Link to Download
  • Format: csv
  • Separated by year (2015, 2017, 2018 and 2019)
Geological Survey of India

open-access field surveys

Link to Download Link to a Paper Using Dataset
  • Format: Certain files contain images in zip or rar file
Landslide Inventory for the 2018 Monsoon Rainfall in Kerala, India

formed from object-based image analysis (OBIA) and field surveys of damaging landslides

Link to Download Link to a Paper Using Dataset
  • Format: zip
Landslide Dataset for Chamoli, India

uses positive-unlabeled learning-enhanced algorithms to develop landslide susceptibility maps

Upon Request to Author Link to a Paper Using Dataset
Landslide Dataset for Bijie, China

contains landslide/non-landslide images, shapefiles of landslide boundaries, and corresponding digital elevation model data

Link to Download Link to a Paper Using Dataset
  • Format: pytorch
  • TIFF format; 512 × 512 pixels
Earthquake Induced Landslides Triggered by 2015 Gorkha Earthquake

each author has own method of data collection

Link to Download
  • Format: zip
Landslide Dataset of Nepal for Semantic Segmentation

from a fully convolutional neural network U-Net

Link to Download Link to a Paper Using Dataset
  • Format: rar
  • Split for test, train, and val
Landslide Inventory for Nepal (2010 - 2021)

identified through a bibliometric analysis of articles published from 2010 to 2021

Link to Download Link to a Paper Using Dataset
  • Format: xlsx
  • Hexplot
Geodata of Landslides By Earthquake East of Dharapani, Manang District, Nepal

on 25 April, 2015

Link to Download
  • Format: zip
United States Geological Survey (USGS) Lanslide Hazards

each article has a View Data Release that contains donwloadable links"

Link to Download
  • Format: varies (zip, csv, xlsx, and more)
Landslide Dataset for Qinling, China

data obtained from field surveys, automated extraction via deep learning, and manual visual interpretations

Link to Download Link to a Paper Using Dataset
  • Format: rar file that unzips to shp files
Non-seismic Fatal Landslide in China from 2010 to 2022

Dataset formed from governemnt reports, NASA Cooperative Open Online Landslide Repository, Global Fatal Landslide Database, and Landslide Blog of Petley

Upon Request to Author Link to a Paper Using Dataset
NASA Cooperative Open Online Landslide Repository

consists of landslide/non-landslide images, shapeﬁles of landslide boundaries, and corresponding digital elevation model data
